name: edutracker
description: EduTracker is a comprehensive school management API built with Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and Sequelize. It manages students, teachers, attendance, grades, behavior records, communications, reports, and notifications. The system provides role-based authentication for admins, teachers, students, and parents, with full RESTful API endpoints and JSON responses. Designed for scalability and relational data integrity, supporting JSONB fields for flexible data storage.
author: MohamedKaled Mohamed shaban
